snippet: If you don't understand the rules, it's easy to get into trouble.
abstract: If you don't understand the rules, it's easy to get into trouble.
lead_paragraph: We have just published a small-business guide to hiring independent contractors. Written by Katherine Reynolds Lewis, the guide quotes Jeff Ready, chief executive of Scale Computing, about his reluctance to make full-time hires: "It's been difficult to predict the future in terms of the strength of the economy," Mr. Ready said. "You have to be very prudent in how you hire. What I'm doing is trying to keep a smaller in-house contingent and supplement it with contractors based on the ebbs and flows of how much business we have."

headline.main: Have You Had Success Hiring Independent Contractors?
